title: Ep 263 | Uncle Si's Party, Phil Doesn't Get Flea Markets & the Problem with the Robertson Code
description:
Phil accidentally shows up to Si and Christine's 50th anniversary bash, and Stone lets Jase know he's not a fan of the Robertson Code when Si's life is at stake. Jase misidentifies a metal-detecting find as a carrier pigeon necklace. Al attempts to explain flea markets to Phil. And the guys go into detail about how to share the Gospel.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
